data.enText: topic of discussion
an important topic that people are discussing or arguing about

data.chText: 关键的 / 敏感的 / 有争议的问题
data.enText: a key/sensitive/controversial issue

data.chText: 这是个重大问题，我们需要花较多的时间考虑。
data.enText: This is a big issue ; we need more time to think about it.

data.chText: 她通常写环境方面的题材。
data.enText: She usually writes about environmental issues.

data.chText: 工会打算提出加班的问题。
data.enText: The union plans to raise the issue of overtime.

data.chText: 该党在这一问题上存在分歧。
data.enText: The party was divided on this issue.

data.chText: 你只不过是在回避问题。
data.enText: You're just avoiding the issue .
Don't confuse the issue .
problem/worry
a problem or worry that sb has with sth
Money is not an issue .

data.chText: 我认为问题并非我的私生活。
data.enText: I don't think my private life is the issue here.

data.chText: 我不在乎花钱——是你一直在拿钱大做文章。
data.enText: I'm not bothered about the cost─you're the one who's making an issue of it.

data.chText: 我是在一个不正常的家庭里长大的，所以乱发脾气是我的一大问题。
data.enText: Because I grew up in a dysfunctional family, anger is a big issue for me.

data.chText: 她经常节食——她担心吃得太多。
data.enText: She's always on a diet─she has issues about food.

data.chText: 他在与女性打交道方面仍有些问题。
data.enText: He still has some issues with women (= has problems dealing with them) .

data.chText: 如有问题，请拨打这个电话号码。
data.enText: If you have any issues, please call this number.
magazine/newspaper
one of a regular series of magazines or newspapers
the July issue of ‘What Car?’
The article appeared in issue 25.
of stamps/coins/shares
a number or set of things that are supplied and made available at the same time
The company is planning a new share issue .
a special issue of stamps
making available/known
the act of supplying or making available things for people to buy or use

data.chText: 我在新邮票发行的当天就买了一套。
data.enText: I bought a set of the new stamps on the date of issue.
the issue of blankets to the refugees

data.chText: 法德两国外交部长联合声明的发布
data.enText: the issue of a joint statement by the French and German foreign ministers
children
children of your own
He died without issue.
be at issue
to be the most important part of the subject that is being discussed

data.chText: 议论的焦点是她是否应对自己的行为负责任。
data.enText: What is at issue is whether she was responsible for her actions.
take issue with sb (about/on/over sth)

data.chText: 向某人提出异议；开始与某人争论
data.enText: to start disagreeing or arguing with sb about sth

data.chText: 我必须就那一点向你提出异议。
data.enText: I must take issue with you on that point.
force the issue
to do sth to make people take a decision quickly
make known
to make sth known formally

data.chText: 他们发表联合声明否认指控。
data.enText: They issued a joint statement denying the charges.

data.chText: 警方发出了寻找目击证人的呼吁。
data.enText: The police have issued an appeal for witnesses.
give
to give sth to sb, especially officially

data.chText: 发护照 / 签证 / 票
data.enText: to issue passports/visas/tickets

data.chText: 新成员将配发临时身份卡。
data.enText: New members will be issued with a temporary identity card.

data.chText: 工作许可证只发给了5%的申请人。
data.enText: Work permits were issued to only 5% of those who applied for them.
law

data.chText: （尤指通过正式文件）将…诉诸法律
data.enText: to start a legal process against sb, especially by means of an official document
to issue a writ against sb
A warrant has been issued for his arrest.
magazine
to produce sth such as a magazine, article, etc.

data.chText: 我们出版一份通讯月刊。
data.enText: We issue a monthly newsletter.
stamps/coins/shares
to produce new stamps, coins, shares, etc. for sale to the public

data.chText: 他们特别发行了一套纪念邮票。
data.enText: They issued a special set of stamps to mark the occasion.
issue from sth
to come out of sth

data.chText: 他嘴里发出了微弱颤抖的声音。
data.enText: A weak trembling sound issued from his lips.
credit-card issuers

means: (尤指通过正式文件)将…诉诸法律

ex.chText: 她总是问些不好回答的问题。
问题是，我是应该和他去看电影，还是应该和她去逛街。
ex.enText: The question is whether I should go to the cinema with him, or go shopping with her.

ex.chText: 你是怎么回答老师的问题的?
ex.enText: What did you say in answer to the teacher's question?

ex.chText: 对于她来说，这个问题太荒谬了。
ex.enText: To her, the question is quite absurd.

synonyms.bx: 通常指以口头或书面形式提出来要求回答或有待讨论解决的问题。

ex.chText: 你应该向委员会提出性别歧视的问题。
ex.enText: You should raise the issue of gender discrimination with the council.

ex.chText: 候选人在他的演讲里谈到了滥用权力的问题。
ex.enText: The candidate addressed the issue of power abuse in his speech.

ex.chText: 他们开始辩论人权问题。
ex.enText: They began to debate the issues of human rights.

ex.chText: 他们已经出版了很多论述国际问题的新书。
ex.enText: They've published a lot of new books on international issues.

ex.chText: 澳大利亚力图在这个问题上保持低姿态。
ex.enText: Australia was trying to keep a low profile on this issue.

synonyms.bx: 多指社会或政治方面尚有争论的问题。

ex.chText: 问题是我们怎样才能得到原材料。
ex.enText: The problem is how we can get the raw material.

ex.chText: 相关部门正在讨论旨在解决毒品问题的新举措。
ex.enText: Related departments are discussing new measures aimed at tackling the drug problem.

ex.chText: 资金短缺已经引起了一个重大问题。
ex.enText: The shortage of money has posed a major problem.

ex.chText: 污染是一个有待解决的大问题。
ex.enText: Pollution is a big problem to be solved.

ex.chText: 律师的建议使他们所有的问题得以解决。
ex.enText: The lawyer's advice led to the resolution of all their problems.

synonyms.bx: 指客观存在的、难以处理或理解的问题，多为引起担心或造成困难的具体事情。

data.enText: be at issue
to be the most important part of the subject that is being discussed

data.chText: 议论的焦点是她是否应对自己的行为负责任。
data.enText: What is at issue is whether she was responsible for her actions.
take issue with sb (about/on/over sth)

data.chText: 向某人提出异议；开始与某人争论
data.enText: to start disagreeing or arguing with sb about sth

data.chText: 我必须就那一点向你提出异议。
data.enText: I must take issue with you on that point.
force the issue
to do sth to make people take a decision quickly
issue from sth
to come out of sth

data.chText: 他嘴里发出了微弱颤抖的声音。
data.enText: A weak trembling sound issued from his lips.

tr: the act of providing an item for general use or for official purposes (usually in quantity)
example: a new issue of stamps
the last issue of penicillin was over a month ago

tr: the act of issuing printed materials
an opening that permits escape or release
example: he blocked the way out
the canyon had only one issue

tr: some situation or event that is thought about
example: he kept drifting off the topic
he had been thinking about the subject for several years
it is a matter for the police

tr: an important question that is in dispute and must be settled
example: the issue could be settled by requiring public education for everyone
politicians never discuss the real issues

tr: one of a series published periodically
example: she found an old issue of the magazine in her dentist's waiting room
not a day's difference between the emergence of the andrenas and the opening of the willow catkins

tr: the immediate descendants of a person
example: she was the mother of many offspring
he died without issue

tr: a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon
example: the magnetic effect was greater when the rod was lengthwise
his decision had depressing consequences for business
he acted very wise after the event

tr: the income or profit arising from such transactions as the sale of land or other property
example: the average return was about 5%

tr: supplies (as food or clothing or ammunition) issued by the government

example: Water issued from the hole in the wall
The words seemed to come out by themselves

tr: prepare and issue for public distribution or sale
example: publish a magazine or newspaper

tr: bring out an official document (such as a warrant)

example: write out a check
cut a ticket
Please make the check out to me

tr: circulate or distribute or equip with
example: issue a new uniform to the children
supply blankets for the beds

value.def: An issue is an important subject that people are arguing about or discussing.

example.ex: Agents will raise the issue of prize-money for next year's world championships...
example.tran: 经纪人将提出下年度世锦赛奖金的问题。

example.ex: A key issue for higher education in the 1990's is the need for greater diversity of courses...
example.tran: 20 世纪 90 年代,高等教育的一个重要议题是要使课程更加多样化。

example.ex: Is it right for the Church to express a view on political issues?
example.tran: 教会对政治问题发表看法是否恰当？

value.tran: 重要问题;议题;争论的问题

value.def: If something is the issue, it is the thing you consider to be the most important part of a situation or discussion.

example.ex: I was earning a lot of money, but that was not the issue...
example.tran: 我赚很多钱,但那不是最重要的。

example.ex: She avoided the issue by ordering a turkey sandwich...
example.tran: 她点了份火鸡三明治,以此来避开这个重要问题。

example.ex: Do not draw it on the chart, however, as this will confuse the issue...
example.tran: 但不用把它画到图上去,因为那样反而会混淆问题的重点。

example.ex: The real issue was never addressed.
example.tran: 真正的要害问题根本没有被提及。

value.tran: 首要事项;要点;问题的要害

value.def: An issue of something such as a magazine or newspaper is the version of it that is published, for example, in a particular month or on a particular day.

example.ex: The growing problem is underlined in the latest issue of the Lancet...
example.tran: 最近一期的《柳叶刀》杂志中强调了这一日益严重的问题。

example.ex: I read Germaine Greer's article in the March issue with particular interest.
example.tran: 我饶有兴致地阅读了杰曼·格里尔在三月那期发表的文章。

value.def: If you issue a statement or a warning, you make it known formally or publicly.

example.ex: Last night he issued a statement denying the allegations...
example.tran: 昨晚他发表声明否认那些指控。

example.ex: The government issued a warning that the strikers should end their action or face dismissal...
example.tran: 政府发布了警告,要求罢工者停止行动,否则将被解雇。

example.ex: Yesterday his kidnappers issued a second threat to kill him.
example.tran: 昨天绑匪再次威胁要将他撕票。

value.def: If you are issued with something, it is officially given to you.

example.ex: On your appointment you will be issued with a written statement of particulars of employment...
example.tran: 正式任命时,你会拿到一份关于雇用细则的书面声明。

example.ex: Staff will be issued with new grey-and-yellow designer uniforms.
example.tran: 将会向雇员发放灰黄相间的名牌新制服。

example.ex: ...a standard army issue rifle.
example.tran: 一支常规军队配备的步枪

value.def: When something such as a liquid, sound, or smell issues from something, it comes out of that thing.

example.ex: A tinny voice issued from a speaker.
example.tran: 扬声器里传出了细微的声音。

value.tran: (液体、声音、气味)流出，发出，冒出

value.def: The question or point at issue is the question or point that is being argued about or discussed.

example.ex: The problems of immigration were not the question at issue...
example.tran: 移民问题不在讨论之列。

example.ex: One of the main points at issue is that the Community wants the representatives to be based in East Jerusalem.
example.tran: 争论的要点之一是,共同体希望代表们的总部设在东耶路撒冷。

value.def: If you make an issue of something, you try to make other people think about it or discuss it, because you are concerned or annoyed about it.

example.ex: It seemed the Colonel had no desire to make an issue of the affair.
example.tran: 看上去上校不想在那件事上挑起争端。

value.tran: 使…引起关注;在…上挑起争论

value.def: If you take issue with someone or something they said, you disagree with them, and start arguing about it.

example.ex: Sister Morrison might take issue with me on that matter...
example.tran: 莫里森修女在那件事上或许会和我持不同意见。

example.ex: I will not take issue with the fact that we have a recession.
example.tran: 我不否认经济衰退的事实。

value.def: If someone has issues with a particular aspect of their life, they have problems connected with it.

example.ex: I think once you do have issues with food you're going to have them for the rest of your life.
example.tran: 我认为一旦你吃东西有问题的话,你可能终生都会如此。

trans: （股票或债券）初次上市发行，新发行债（证）券，（增额债券的）首次发行
做文章；若把这个当作一个话题
热门股票；上市不久价格猛涨的股票
专辑；特集；特刊；专刊；特辑
社会问题；社会议题；议题关怀；社会事件；社会事项
配股；认股权发行，有购股权的证券发行(公司以优惠价格向现有股东发售新股)
